entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as enjoying commentary more.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as chortling and clutching a Gurdyroot.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as being sped past with Harry.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A student who is described as 'insane' but has grown on Ron.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: A student who appears at the foot of the marble staircase looking thunderous.

entities.name: gurdyroot
entities.description: An object that Luna says is excellent for warding off Gulping Plimpies.

entities.name: cat litter
entities.description: An object that Luna stuffs back into her bag.

entities.name: toadstool
entities.description: An object that Luna says is not a Gurdyroot.

entities.name: gulping plimpies
entities.description: A monster that the Gurdyroot is said to ward off.

relationships.description: Ron says Luna has grown on him.
Harry and Hermione are seen together by Lavender Brown.
Luna says she has a few Gurdyroots.
Lavender Brown appears looking thunderous and asks Harry why he didn't tell her he was getting out today.
